tool_description:
Check domain name's availability at blazing speeds using this free API.
Currently we support com, net, org, biz, mobi and co domain search, will be adding more soon.
name: Blazing Domain Availability Search
title: Blazing Domain Availability Search

api_list.name: Blazing Domain Availability Search
api_list.description: Check domain name availability at blazing speeds.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: name of the domain that you want to search for.
